trans-unit.source: Represents the security settings of the wsHttpBinding binding.
trans-unit.target: 代表 wsHttpBinding 的繫結的安全性設定。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.NonDualMessageSecurityOverHttp"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.ServiceModel.NonDualMessageSecurityOverHttp"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether a security context token is established.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出是否已建立安全性內容權杖。

trans-unit.source: This property controls whether a security context token is established through a WS-SecureConversation exchange between the client and the service.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性控制是否透過用戶端與服務之間的 Ws-secureconversation 交換建立安全性內容權杖。

trans-unit.source: Setting it to `true` requires that the remote party supports WS-SecureConversation.
trans-unit.target: 將它設定為`true`需要遠端合作對象所支援的 Ws-secureconversation。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if a security context token is established; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果已建立安全性內容權杖;否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。
